Review: view is perfect. poor wifi tho

We were hesitant given some of the reviews, but decided to book the bungalow for three nights. We were overwhelmed with the service provided by Teteng our butler. The food was exceptional and the animals (birds, ducks, geese, and chickens) on the property give the Hof Gorei a unique style that compliments its lush surroundings. The pool is well shade and on a steep section of the resort. Totally serene and tranquil. Low or high tide swimming at the beach is a delight. Sunsets at the end of the pier- come and see for yourself you will be captivated by the anchored boats and the mountain range on the horizon.

I didn't expect the place to be so nice, and the staff to be very accommodating :) had a relaxing time, a weekend escape. I would recommend this to couples. When I made the booking, I didn't know that it was a romantic place. Still, all sorts of group would probably also have a fine time :)
Cockroaches running around in the cottage. Worst food ever tasted for the money Beach dirty full of debris
Nice place, good food, kind staff, average rooms
It’s a good place for relaxing but the Island hopping , foods and drinks are very much more expensive compare to other Resort in Philipine

If you are into nature tripping, this is definitely the place to be. Sobrang ganda ng beach. Pagdating mo pa lang sa daungan nila ng bangka may sasalubong kagad sayo. Nice people. EXCEPTIONALY nice room sa beach front. Napakaganda, although wala silang cable sa tv, reasonable dahil di ka naman nagpunta dun para manuod ng tv but to enjoy nature. Good food at a reasonable, reasonable ang sinabi ko because it is not cheap pero the presentation, the taste and the serving says it all. We stayed here for 3 days.Beach is great! White sand, crystal clear waters! Payo lang po, if you have plans of getting tour packages, better get it from the resort. Also, kung di ka sumasakay/umaangkas ng motorcycle, dont get the inland tour. Habal lang ang nakaka labas pasok sa resort at di kaya ng sasakyan. Will try the island hopping pag nakabalik. Worth coming back? Definitely a YES! Salamat po for making our 3 day stay a very wonderful experience.

The ambiance is so nice, dining by the beach with white sand, very clear water with natural habitat preserved, like I saw 3 starfish in different colors in one spot. Having a valet service dedicated to each set of guest is also awesome.

Service on our visit at Hof Gorei is outstanding . Did not expect the personal service we got from our host Darell . He catered to all our needs and wants . The service at Hof Gorei is more than worth the stay . Thank You , Hof Gorei and Darell
we stayed in the round rooms located half way up the hillside the view was spectacular i highly recamend this resort

One of the best three day resort holiday I have had. Resort had their own ferry to/from Samal. Beachfront cabana was well worth it with a great ocean view. Everything is at your finger tips with just a ring of the bell and your personal assistant is there to help you. Room was quite large and bed was very comfortable. Room safe is also available but I left my stuff out and did not have an issue with anything missing. TV was provided but only local channels and no cable but why would you need that at a resort. WIFI is also not available but was not an issue getting internet access via GLOBE or SMART from our phones. Jacuzzi and swimming pool well maintained and we used both several time. Jet ski, kayaking, banana boat all available through the resort. Food is excellent and service is great! I cannot speak enough good things about this place and will definitely go back when the opportunity allows. Do not hesitate to book this resort if you have the chance.

Resort is very remote and very difficult access via road. So once you enter the resort you cannot go out. The food they sell is good but quite expensive. Every thing is charged, 1/2 litre water at 38pesos, 1 hour Jetski at 5000pesos, average dishes at 350pesos... Water of swimming pool not clean, beach chalet quite small and no wardrobe to put our clothes. Night at 6pm and nothing to do in the evening. TV is only few philipinos channel, a DVD player with few movies will have been welcome to entertain the evening. Snorkeling is very disappointing all around Samal island. No fish and coral not nice or dead. Not worth the money!
Kinda okay but food price is too expensive! place is ok

Arrived at the prearranged time with Hof to be told we had to wait a further hour for the room Only after complaint were we given a room to wait in whilst preparing our rooms They then insisted on an additional 1850 Php for our 8 year old daughter extra bed that we said we did not require. but they insisted was company policy. The place is tired and run down, It is overrun with cats dogs and Fowl making horrendous noise all night not to mention the droppings everywhere. Eating lunch on the beach, dogs constantly sat at the table evening dinner no better at Alfresco, my daughter plagued by cats around her legs. I had to chase off, All beverages were almost 2 1/2 times the price in any other hotel we stayed in Davao. At the pool our son aged 2 intimidated by and threatened by Geese wandering freely around the pool. Only swift action by the pool attendant prevented him being pecked. The staff were very accommodating and helpful. All on the brochure and in reality differs a great deal

Pros: -beach front -all types of animals running around -peaceful Cons: -2000PHP for their shuttle to take you anywhere outside the hotel area -not walkable to anything else, you have to stay there -ants, cockroaches in the rooms -butler was not the friendliest -food is expensive, approx 1000PHP per person per day -kitchen closes early 7pm -bathroom shower didn’t drain, toilet was dirty

I was amaze coz we have our own butler around, who is friendly and nice.. The room is clean and comfy. We stayed the round Hilltop cottage. The beach was not that great, too many corals; would recommend to wear a beach shoes. Since i did not enjoy the beach, i had my dips in the pool. I kinda enjoyed it. But there were floating leaves and insects. No loud videoke which is great.. Was able to relax the whole night.

I went here with my friend last Nov. 21. The weather is rainy upon arrival but fortunately, turned to be a good the next day. Funny thing though that the welcome drinks and the ice-cold towel offered upon arrival somewhat did not blend into the current weather. Haha. The butler assigned to us seemed to be a trainee because when I asked about info especially about their menu, she always say she doesn't know. Anyway, another butler accompanied her right in time before I almost complain. From that time until checkout, there are two butlers approaching us for our needs. Good thing! :-) We took our lunch, dinner and our complimentary breakfast here. I should say that their food tasted great! Don't ever miss their take on tinola! However, as others say, their entire menu is somewhat pricey and I can't get why the 12% VAT is separated from the printed price. If the management reads this review, I suggest you incorporate it on the price itself or make it a service charge or some other term.

What amazed me about this resort is the butler system. Although i would like to think this the perfect beach resort for the budget traveller, the place does need to at least make itself presentable. It's like a zoo. Chickens and dogs were running around and poo of those were almost everywhere. Constant cleaning is needed, but obviously manpower is lacking. Not sure if the pool is barely used, but when I went there, the water was swimmable, but a lot of debris and ants around the pool. Then again, regular cleaning is needed. For those who booked in rooms NOT close to the ocean, be ready to walk some stairs. Especially the huts and the house overlooking the ocean. The view is simply the best, but at the cost of your leg. The name of the resort wasn't even obvious at the port. Not advertising "Welcome to Hof Gorei" at the front is not good advertising as well. The beach area is well-maintained and the beach is nice to swim in. In fact, id rather prefer this than the pool.
Everything went well so far. Staff named Edison who assisted us all through out our stay is very friendly and accommodating.

I highly recommend this resort. Accommodating staff and owner. The only resort that provides butler (personal assistant). Nature ambiance. Relaxing place. Clean room and surroundings. I will definitely go back this place and bring some friends or family. Till next time. Hof gof gorei! :D

Place is beautiful, private, and peaceful. You're surrounded by lush gardens, nature and even exotic birds. I saw a praying mantus and fireflies! Food is suberb though pricey, its still worth it. You can opt to have your meals on the beachside which was really nice. Would come back for a romantic getaway or for some R&R.

I love the place very exclusive nipa hut room is nice inside but not so good outside but toilet and bath is outside the room we have to go downstair if we will use it, incovenient during nightime and creepy because outside is so dark. Nice thing is we have our own buttler the staff are nice..the food is quite pricey .for 3 meals for couple cost us 2k .
If they revamp this place it will be very nice. Nice room and the personal butler was the only highlight. Other than that. its okay if you are a nature lover.

Hof Gorei is owned by April a very nice lady with international experience who is always helpful and attentive like all staff at Hof Gorei. The really unique thing is the sustainable concept, with a lot of nature, animals, flowers, fruits and the lovely beach! Snorkeling, island hoping and other activities are very recommendable and the staff will organize everything for you. The bungalows are simple but nice, there is no need for more because of the fantastic nature around!

Very lush with a pretty good beach, pool , food. and friendly and helpful staff. Some of the cottages have cramped balconies and are a bit faded, but nice. The house at the top has great views but is a long uphill trek from the beach.

Samal island is an amazing place. And staying at this hotel made me see and appreciate that more. If you are after relaxation and being one with nature, this is the place to be. We stayed in the Round hillhut and the walk there is challenging aince it's in the top of a hill, but it is worth it because the view there is amazing. The free boat transfer was an awesome surprise. The food was great and fairly priced for a hotel in a remote island. Will definitely come back whenever I visit Davao. :)
Staff and owner are very friendly. It's a good place for people who are nature lover but some amenities need good update or maintenance.

We have enjoyed our stay at this beach resort. The staff, especially our personal butler, Lalang is so kind and accomodating. We stayed at the Hillside Round Hut, the view is spectacular overlooking Davao Gulf and a glimpse of Mt. Apo. It was refreshing to see beautiful flowers and plants at their tropical garden. We also enjoyed walking on the beach front, well maintained with white sand and prestine blue water, and watched the beautiful sunset. We requested to have our dinner at the beach front and we are so satisfied with the set-up and the food is absolutely delicious. Travel going there and back to the City is convenient because they provide boat transfers on Santa Ana wharf. Overall, it was a very nice experience and we'll definitely go back there in the future...
We had no idea there's a butler. But it was a nice surprise. We were attended by the staff and they were very friendly. The food is pricey though.
and they will nickle and dime you for every person and child checking in...
the location is very nice. Amazing beach and accommodation. Food is very good but it a bit pricey.

Been there with a friend, i am not expecting so much about this place but hof gorei surprised me. Located in the heart of samal island more or less 1 hour boat ride from sta. ana wharf davao city. The boat ride is free it is included when you booked a room from them.Staff is really nice ( well i thought davaoenios are very stiff and not approachable haha ) special mention to "Ate Thang" i highly recommend her when you visit the resort you can request from the resort for her as your personal Service Crew/Staff. And One thing about this place i really really really love is their AMAZING CHEF! yes! the food is really really really great! i will surely visit them again :)

Providing round-way boat transportation service from Sta. Ana Wharf to the resort free of charge is very sweet. Having breakfast at Hill Hut terrace is awesome, you can see mountain Apo if the weather is clear. Dinner at beach can see the sunset. You can indulge yourself into the quiet and peaceful nature at Hof Gorei. The whole resort is designed like a tropical garden. There is an outside swimming pool, looks really nice. Everything's awesome, except the snorkeling tour to Tulicud Island. It's not worth the money at all! 4288P for two person! Only went to two places maximum 2 hours in the water! And with other guests! Lunch on the island was just fine. We didn't get any special care even we told our butler that neither my husband nor I can swim. No professional tour guide providing any service under water! It's overcharged and not equivalent the service. And we didn't see any attractive corals at these two places at all! Summary: 1. Resort itself is awesome, strongly recommend, especially for couples. The atmosphere here is full of romance. 2. Snorkeling tour service to Tulicud Island is too much overpriced! Not recommend! 3. The resort location is far from the town. The butler called us two motorcycles, round trip fee at 1000P is also overpriced! Suggest call the motorcycle by yourself outside the resort. Butler service need to be improved. We asked for boat fishing service at least two times, but no response. Motorcycle arrangement for us is good, but overpriced too much! No room cleaning service during our two-night stay. Safe-box in the room was out of work.
You have your own butler
If you want noise go somewhere else. If you want nature peace and good food its the place for you.

Location is superb with great food and personalized butler to assist you from the day you check in until you check out, will make sure that every thing you need will be met. You'll fall in love with the place and we'll definitely want to come back.
Satisfied

Very accessible beach from mainland Davao City. Beach quality is OK but the view is fantastic from hillside tree hut. What disappoints me are the staff. No staffs at top when it is 9pm!! I am worried about security esp I have my precious one along.

Got the desired rest in Hof Gorei. It helped that our "butler" was very attentive in our needs especially our food. Food is great, a bit price but filling. The room we got was high up the 217 steps. Worth the climb up because of the awesome views of Davao and Mt Apo. Just not friendly to persons with mobility concerns and seniors. Our room was spare and clean. But the door knob and shower knob kept falling off. Great place for quiet and going easy on the pace.
Wonderful weekend at Hof Gorei. The owner and staff were so nice and welcoming! Beautiful property. Loved the tree houses and being able to have dinner on the beach. Will definitely go back!

Overall stay is 4 out of 5 stars. Staff are very welcoming and their boat (transfer to hotel) is well maintained (both on performance and appearance). They arranged our dinner and breakfast at the beach on scheduled time and even provided additional towels as needed. Needs improvement on hotel facilities (like shower head and lights).

Needs a lot of improvement.. I don't find it clean.,it's not a kind of resort that you would love to jump right away the moment you will see the water,. For me I find it disgusting when I saw the toilet from this bridge going to the Main and disturbing to see the houses tilts on the water nearby the resort. I didn't even swim,. We stayed overnight but I really want to go back to city right away.. it's even overpriced for a standard kind of resort. The staff are just really friendly and polite..
Super quite resort, large food servings, staff was great always there to help.
I will highly recomend this place for all kinds of group of people...

Wonderful garden, has awesome view from the huts,very friendly staff, nice pool, very relaxing. Had a great 4 days stay. It was my second time and will likely come again as not far from Davao and good value for money.
Only good beach

The place is in great need of investment to bring it up to a reasonable standard. No wifi except at the bar and office and too slow Huts were comfortable but bathrooms below an acceptable world standard Staff very nice and always helpful. Beach had nice white sand. Very over priced for what it was and appears no money has been spent on the resort for a long time. Pillows too hard if you looking for a good nights sleep.

Rooms, food and drinks way overpriced for this standard of resort. I have stayed at many similar resorts and never been charged 12%VAT! Is the government getting it? Beach is nice and clean, as is the pool. gardens could do with a bit more maintenance...dead tree baranched lying around, grass needs clipping where it comes over the path. whilst the staff wwere pleasant they spent a lot of time sitting around when they could have been doing maintenance.
The location is okay, quite secluded, but the price of beverage is ridiculous.

Menu is limited. Drinks are expensive. Rooms are nice, pool is ok. Very quiet hotel, next to very very expensive pearl farm. The beach is a bit slimey underfoot. And they have friendly hornbill birds which roam around the property which can be a little scary when they try to enter your room. The service is great and Jen is a personal butler. Good views from round hut, and it's a great setting for meals there. They have a fridge and kettle in the rooms, which paradise island doesn't. Overall good, but preferred paradise island cause of their cheaper prices, better beach, and bigger food selection.

The whole stay was not good. Restroom was not good aircon wont get cold fast the pool was gross the beach have a lot of plastic and stinks . There is a hornbill and would flew to you whileyou are in the pool.food is tooooo expensive. Too dark at night. The crew were not very willing to help. I wont recommend this place. Not worth the travel time

The staff were very friendly and accomodating. They have wonderful accomodation also, very clean, confortable, and the environment is so relaxing. When you get there, u'll feel the essence of nature. The beach is so calm (well atleast during our stay),. The beach is secluded in such a way that u will have ur utmost privacy.. the services also were very good. Staff are ready anytime, u even have ur personal butler that can attend to you at any moment. To sum it up, its perfect. The place is like a paradise. One thing that needs improvement though (but does not relate to the resort) is the access thru by land. Its quite a challenge if u do.. hehe

We are Raymond + Annalyn Rampe from France. We celebrated our Engagement in 2012 in Hof Gorei. Gaddiel our witness that time. My wife is from Davao. Finally: If you prefer an unforgettable Holidays book to Hof Gorei.

There are several highlights of my trip to this resort: 1. The place is beautiful. Peaceful. A place where you can just relax and read a good book. 2. The hotel room which is situated in a mountain is like a treetop room with hotel amenities. 3. Personal butler who will attend to all your needs. 4. Breakfast is really good 5. The view is breathtaking both at daytime and nighttime. You can see the ocean and the Davao city Downside: 1. Food is quite pricey. Ordered 1.5 Coke and it cost pHp158 with VAT. 2. Even the inland tour is expensive. Good thing I get to meet someone in Samal who has a motorcycle and paid only 1k to visit the tourist destination within the area. Over-all, it is worth it!
Great for location convenience and a relaxing get away. Even for an evening
Location was Peaceful and relaxing A bit expensive Food and other island activity. Will try to come back 7.5/10

Stayed for 2 days and 1 night for our honeymoon and we really had a good time. The hotel staffs are very friendly and warm and we get to have our own buttler. The only problem we had is the bathroom, the hot and cold shower is not working as well as the toilet flush. We informed ate tang ( our personal buttler) and she immediately checked the bathroom and told us to use the other bathroom which is just located 10steps away from our room. The view is is magestic though you really have to take looooong stairs going to the top of the resort. The beach area is soooo clean. The food is expensive BUT its worth the price because the serving is big enough to be shared by 2 ( just have to buy 1 extra rice, we ordered baby back ribs ). The hotel owner is very nice and accomodating ( you actually cant tell that shes the owner because shes very simple looking ). What's extra special in our stay is their tour guide ( TEDDY the schitzu ) who always follow us wherever we go. We will definetly comeback to this place is time permits and highly recommended for those who wants to escape the busy life of the city.
The prices of the food on top of 12% VAT Zwere really shocking - does not justify the serving.
All extra's cost high price!

The place is so beautiful. So solemn and peaceful. You can only hear the sound of sea waves, insects and birds. The staffs are so nice and accommodating. They will attend to your needs at their very best.. The food is kinda so so and quite expensive, unfortunately, no other option where you can buy alternative food. Warning for family going with kids. There are 2 birds (Kalaw) which are literally angry with kids roaming around. So don't let them off the place without supervision.
Everything was great - staff, place and food (it's pricey but food was good and they serve big) The only thing that did not somehow amazed me is the beach so we're at the pool most of the time.
The place is relaxing and quiet good place to unwind. The idea of having a butler during our stay is cool! Since the place is in mountain there's a lot of flying insect and ants.
Not flexible,not negotiable
We had a nice and peaceful stay here.we were able to unwind and relax in this perfect place.thanks to their accommodating staff who helped us with all the things we needed.

Had a nice time there. Great if you just want to be away from the city buzz and looking for a nice quiet place to be. The beach is fine but the sea is too rocky. Mosquito haters, please bring your repellents. Food is great and the price is good. Staff are friendly and so is the lady boss. Unfortunate thing is electricity was lost due to some underwater cable issue. Aircon had to be switched off during most parts of the day and night. Other than that, I would love to stay there again if I want to get away from the city. P.s. phone reception & 3G is bad there.... Wireless is available only near the bar but unfortunately it is also slow and full of my dear mosquitoes. =)
its a little expensive the rate for the motocycle rent its crazy

If you are so stressed, Hof Gorei is the best place. You can really relax here. The place is so peaceful. Their staff are very accommodating. We are travelling as couple for our anniversary and lucky we are at the right place. We enjoyed our romantic dinner date at the beach. One unique thing at HOf Gorei is that we have our personal staff that will help us everything that we need at Hof Gorei. Pets here are allowed too. All in all we like the service of Hof Gorei
Beautiful hotel. Nice and helpful staff

The location is nice, beach is good and the staff are super friendly but the pool was not cleaned, the restrooms are bit rusty and the veranda where we stayed was full of dried leaves and bird droppings... If you hate stairs or climbing up, this place is not for you because before you reach your room, you have to climb 40-70 steps and before you reach the jacuzzi, you have to go up 240 steps!
Accessibility via land is very awful... Very nice and accomodating staff...
It was quite far but if you want a vacation away from it all, this is a great place to be.

Everything is superb in this resort. Its a little far I should say but the place is really worth it. From the port to the crews, the hotel, food everything is recommendable in this place! I can't wait to visit this place again. Kudos to their staff who really took care of us during our overnight stay in Hof. God bless and more power!
The miracle fruits...

The staff are fantastic. I love the concept of having my own personal butler. The place is amazing! Very relaxing. The food is very good also.
Loved the round hut
Tranquillity, scenery, service
Very tranquil & relaxing ambience. Great food. Kind and warm owner/GM.
It is a peaceful location, with its own small beach and pool, and the staff are very helpful
Their staffs- they were very accommodating. The very best thing I could remember is their honesty. Second, the location itself, it's so romantic, a good place when you're in search of your soul.
you have your own butler (kuya darrel), You are the one to choose where to eat and they will set it up for you. very relaxing place. good for couple ❤️❤️❤️
Breakfast on the beach is such a good experience! Lunch and dinner are served to our room and the view from the dinning area are awesome!
food so delicious! And the ground well maintained
the ambiance,the beach,and the staff

they have a super delicious foods, amazing service and super accomodating owner and staff...
The worst experience I have ever had at a so called resort! I have never before had to pay for the privilege of having food poisioning before! The place is a mess!

personal butler,Friendly Staff, relaxing ambiance, great food

We have our own butler who are very friendly and accommodating. The food is not cheap but with the quality and taste is not expensive either. You feel very close to nature.
this hotel is perfect for romantic weekends for couples because its quiet, isolated and you get a free butler service
Superb staff, Close to the beach, great food

It is quiet and secluded, perfect for that getting away from it all feeling, while still able to be active

Royal treatment! :) Very nice room! :) Very delicious food! :)
STAIRS! love it
Freindly staffs, quiet surroundings, great breakfast
attentative staff and concierge, food, beautiful surroundings
friendly and attentive staff, large room and great view of the island
It was nature friendly, thanks to our very kind, beautiful and attentive butler, ate rhea. She's been very helpful to us. The place is perfect for relaxation.
Customer service, beautiful views, beautiful place.
Personal buttler, beach, small number of rooms
Beautiful ocean / garden view, excellent service
The staff were very pleasant. Breakfast at the wharf was enjoyable. Beachfront dining excellent.
location, views, tranquility
Nice garden, ding othe beach, and wonderful butler name Rea.
ocean side on Samal Island, very islolated
friendly staff - food was really nice - gardens, surroundings and rooms are really beautiful and well organized
Clean room, garden view and friendly staff
Very good food, so peaceful and close to nature
the personal butler with good service, Jacuzzi at the hill top, romantic place to relax especially the set up dinner by your butler in the beach front

This hotel has a nice ocean view. One could really relax since the place is quite especially during night time. The staff are very friendly.

nice gardens, nice beach, Moman (our private attendant) was excellent
so relaxing location although a bit expensive in terms of food but it relaxes your heart and miind.
only the staff is OK
just 2 word , peace and quite :D
nice view of sea & mountain, attractive room designs specially for couples

environment, like you're living in a farm, very laid back

Eclectic design, helpful staff, very good food.
Personal butler reniel was fantastic. Place look like hiden Paradise. Nice view on mount APO and davao city
every thing about hotel is best features
Beautiful property, quiet and peaceful
lovely grounds, fair beach and nice pool

View is awesome from attic windows, Attic room comfort excellent, service excellent with private attendant with excellent food with large choice of menu and fresh fruit juice, garden so beautiful and clean and paradisiac,nice kayak available with some local small coral reef
Good service-Expensive beverages and food.
narra everywhere, mini zoo
nature..

swimming pool

We stayed here on a Saturday night (Oct. 13th) and found the room to be very comfortable. very nice, silent, nice to be back. The beds were very good, great shower. Style is ultra modern, if that makes a difference. owner and staff are very hospitable and very friendly.
We liked the service of our personal butler.
value for money

the place is so nice and quite. me and friend really found a place to take a break from the busy environment of metro manila. i love the surroundings all i saw was green so pleasing to our eyes.
jungle setting, beautiful flowers and nice rooms

Set on a pristine beach with a rainforest backdrop, this resort offers total relaxation and all amenities. The staff here are awesome and go the extra step to make your stay an enjoyable one. There are FANTASTIC dive sites only 15 minutes away, and snorkelling off the beach front. This is the best resort I have stayed at in the Philippines and certainly they have the best food. The prices can not be beaten elsewhere, and the rooms are a total delight. The greatest care has been taken to all the small details. The garden surrounding the resort are home to some of the rarest and most exotic plants you will see anywhere. Orchids and Hibiscus stud these magnificent grounds.

The biggest surprise here was the food. Undoubtedly one of the best taste experiences I've had and good value for money. Hof Gorei tries harder than any other resort to accommodate their guests and put maximum effort into service and comfort.
